title: Understanding Schizoid Personality Disorder
text: Schizoid personality disorder is often misunderstood. It is important to recognize the key characteristics that define this disorder.

title: Key Characteristics
text: Individuals with schizoid personality disorder typically exhibit a pattern of detachment from social relationships. They also have a limited range of emotional expression.

hintAnswer: pattern of detachment from social relationships and a limited range of emotional expression
title: Identifying the Correct Pattern
text: Which of the following patterns best describes schizoid personality disorder?
choices: pervasive pattern of distrust and suspicion of others
pattern of detachment from social relationships and a limited range of emotional expression
odd or eccentric behavior, unusual beliefs or magical thinking, social and interpersonal difficulties, and a tendency toward perceptual and cognitive distortions
false belief that coincidental events relate to oneself
